net.myorb.gral

Class GralPrimitives

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.myorb.charting.DisplayGraphSegmentTools
      • net.myorb.gral.GralPrimitives
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BarAndPieSupport, ChartLibSupport

    public class GralPrimitives
extends DisplayGraphSegmentTools
    atomic object property controls of the GRAL chart library
    Author:
    Michael Druckman
